timeline.bodyText:
What happens if an existing flow file has fileLocations in a step, and then saves the flow via QS? Won't the user lose the fileLocations data? This seems risky to me.
Can you test this out in QS? People will still be using QS for many months to come, we can't break anything in it.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: I just realized this is the one-ui class. I think it's worth adding a comment to the JsonIgnore annotation to define why this is being ignored. Should it even be in the class if it's being ignored??
replies.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Made changes so that "fileLocations", if present in the step is retained.
